title: Woman Dies After Accidental Shooting
content:
Update
The Daviess County Sheriff's Office says the woman who died after an accidental shooting was allegedly shot by her husband.
Witnesses say the man was unloading and loading a gun when an accidental discharge struck the 73-year-old woman.
She is still not being identified.
At this time, authorities say foul play is not suspected.
The victim was pronounced dead at the scene.
Original Story
The Daviess Co., KY Sheriff's Office confirms to Eyewitness News they are investigating an accidental shooting in the county.
We're told it happened Wednesday morning at Daviess County Fish and Game.
The victim's name is not being released pending family notification.
We will bring you updates on-air and online as soon as we get them.
